comments.body: Why does this test need to FindMapperPlugin but the others don't?

Since fake volume plugin has both NewMounter and NewBlockVolumeMapper methods, FindxxxBySpec doesn't need in other methods.

But I thought this method is trying to test FindPluginBySpec using volumeSpec.
Because volumetesting.GetTestVolumePluginMgr returns fake volume plugin, but line 301 is intentionally masking plugin from return. Therefore, I also added FindMapperPluginBySpec() to obtain plugin from volumeSpec.
Is this make sense?
Do we have test cases where block plugin is nil? since the majority of volume plugins are not going to implement the block interface yet.
I'll add test cases to check plugin nil case.
